name: Lady in Purple
description:
Traverse an auto running fantasy platformer using the limited key set from Mini Jam 74 to obtain the highest score.

Interact with objects by pressing the key shown on or next to them, and otherwise perform the following actions:

P - Fires your weapon

Space Space Space - Restart Level

Space Space P - Restart Game

Space Space 8 - Quit

This is our first game jam, and we had a blast!
